title: Chor Chor
overview: A 3,000-year-old statue, stolen from an international museum, lands in Gujarat and falls into the hands of pickpockets Nagda and Pintu, who trade it to hotel owner Dhanraj to cover their food bill. When they discover that the government is offering a reward of â‚¹50,00,000 for the statue, they decide to steal it back from Dhanraj's mansion. Meanwhile, unemployed friends Raju and Santosh, dressed as policemen, arrive to steal jewelry. When the duo encounter Nagda and Pintu, they learn about the valuable statue and join the hunt.
